# The `Recycler` Class Template Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/recycler">Recycler</a> - This class manages a linked-list of deallocated nodes and facilitates reusing deallocated memory in place of allocating new memory. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Declaration

<CodeBlock>template &lt;class T, size&#95;t Size = sizeof(T), size&#95;t Align = alignof(T)&gt;
class llvm::Recycler&lt;T, Size, Align&gt;</CodeBlock>

## Description {#details}

<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/recycler">Recycler</a> - This class manages a linked-list of deallocated nodes and facilitates reusing deallocated memory in place of allocating new memory.

### clear() {#a1703e705b5efd7e581a499c4cea00b22}

<MemberDefinition
  template={<>template &lt;class AllocatorType&gt;</>}
  prototype={<>void llvm::Recycler&lt; T, Size, Align &gt;::clear (AllocatorType &amp; Allocator)</>}
  labels = {["inline"]}>
clear - Release all the tracked allocations to the allocator.

The recycler must be free of any tracked allocations before being deleted; calling clear is one way to ensure this.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/recycler-h/#l00072">72</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/recycler-h">Recycler.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### clear() {#a0d80cbcfea984b326e90bcb1db3a6967}

<MemberDefinition
  template={<>template &lt;class T, size&#95;t Size = sizeof(T), size&#95;t Align = alignof(T)&gt;</>}
  prototype={<>void llvm::Recycler&lt; T, Size, Align &gt;::clear (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a8e612822d4ba7bb36c9c79582a567108">BumpPtrAllocator</a> &amp;)</>}
  labels = {["inline"]}>
Special case for <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a8e612822d4ba7bb36c9c79582a567108">BumpPtrAllocator</a> which has an empty <a href="#a85d9d4c602c494ad167d8068a5e52269">Deallocate()</a> function.

There is no need to traverse the free list, pulling all the objects into cache.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/recycler-h/#l00084">84</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/recycler-h">Recycler.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>
